```{r}
library(httr)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)

pl <- list(qcType="N", 
           queryGroups="귤__SZLIG__귤__OUML__팥빙수__SZLIG__팥빙수", 
           startDate="20111101",
           endDate="20161130");
url <- "http://datalab.naver.com/ca/step1/process.naver"
r <- POST(url, body = pl)
res <- content(r)

res$result[[1]]$title   # 귤
res$result[[2]]$title   # 고구마

processSeries <- function(sdata) {
  title <- sdata$title
  tdf <- do.call(rbind, 
              lapply(sdata$data, 
                     data.frame, 
                     stringsAsFactors=FALSE))
  tdf <- mutate(tdf, topic=title, period=as.Date(period, "%Y%m%d")) 
  return(tdf)
}
df <- do.call(rbind, lapply(res$result, processSeries))

```
